name: RealmCraft
description: RealmCraft is the original Sandbox Game. Build Cubes & Explore 30+ Blueprint Worlds in 3D. Try to Survive & Use 100+ Types of Blocks to Build Your Unique Town.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: AMD C-Series C-50 or Intel Core i3-380UM (equivalent or better) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD 6250 or Nvidia GeForce 510 (equivalent or better) DirectX: Version 9.0a Storage: 300 MB available space
